idea:
AirBots Aerospace is a start-up aimed towards developing drone-based solutions for agriculture to transform the Indian Agricultural
sector. AirBots Aerospace have developed software for precision agricultural spraying of pesticides and NanoUrea on farm land. AirBots
has been manufacturing best in class, high performance, reliable and rugged drones for pesticide spraying. AirBots also develops
software solutions for visualization and analysis to convert Aerial data from drones to increase yield and farming efficiency.
name: AIRBOTS AEROSPACE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Eske´ Paris is a D2C bridge-to-luxury lifestyle and travel brand. 

 

With functionality and sustainability at the core, we build versatile products for modern lifestyle. Using new-age sustainable materials[Leathers + Vegan], our products are innovative, lightweight, and affordable. 

 

A brand with global ambitions, Eske´ is built on the bedrock of a lean and vertically integrated structure, using its low-cost base to democratize luxury. As a lead manufacturer for many global premium brands, the 3-decadal domain expertise, product proficiency, operating leverage, and direct-to-consumer model, enable us to bridge the unreasonable gap between price and cost, that most brands command.  

   

With ambitious goals, an experienced team,  profitable metrics, and large opportunity-size, we are looking to raise some funds from the right partner. Given our current scale[ 1cr Mrr, 55% Gross Margins, 15% Ebitda Margins], I believe we would be a great fit for investors.
name: ESKE GLOBAL FASHIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at SMAZE PAY PRIVATE LIMITED is a new fintech company venturing in various aspects of financing needs for individuals + corporates". We are offering full-stack payments & financial solutions to consumers, offline merchants and online platforms. The company is on a mission to bring half a billion Indians into the mainstream economy through payments, E-commerce, banking, investments, and financial services. We are creating innovative digital platform which is connecting to the next generation of the E-mobility world they build the future digital infrastructure for new digital India.
name: SMAZE PAY PRIVATE LIMITED
